|brand = AzureWave |model = AW-CM308 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = NF |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/10/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AzureWave_AW-CM308NF |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = M.2 1.1 |formfactor = 1216
|vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = b822 |subvendor_id = 1a3b |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TLZ-CM308NF |icid = 6100A-CM308NF |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8822BE;RTL8822BE, GBJ06P2, GG51; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MHF4 |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = <!-- [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtlwifi_new rtlwifi_new], see also [https://lwn.net/Articles/768372/ rtw88] --> |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Wave2, DFS, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/10/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *802.11abgn/ac 2T2R (AC1200) *Bluetooth 4.2 (NGFF M.2 1216) {{FCC ST|02/03/2018|indexme.}} {{See also|AzureWave Wireless Adapters}} *[[Realtek#ac]] RTL8822BE - PCIe 1.1 (WLAN)/USB 2.0 (BT) :802.11abgn+ac 2T2R (2x2:2), Wave2, MU-MIMO, BT 4.2
[[AzureWave]] claims Bluetooth 4.2 support in the user manual but :[[Realtek]] only claims Bluetooth 4.1 support for the RTL8822BE The user manual also says: * Support Bluetooth 4.1 system * Support Bluetooth 4.2 LE Secure Connection :by upper layer software upgrade
==See also== *[[AzureWave AW-CB295NF]] - ''802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module'' • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0ef04a284GIqLC6i/AW-CB295NF_DS_B1-V10_STD-20180606.pdf DS] <!-- [[Realtek]] RTL8822BE --> *[[AzureWave AW-CM308NF]] - ''802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module'' *[[AzureWave AW-CM389NF]] - ''802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module'' • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0fccd80bcEDRCVCF/AW-CM389NF-DS-Rev1.2.pdf DS] <!-- [[Marvell]] 88W8897 • LGA 1216 --> *[[AzureWave AW-CH387]] - ''802.11ac WiFi + BT + NFC SiP Module :[[Marvell]] 88W8887 - SDIO/UART (LGA Module for Mobile) *[[AzureWave AW-CH397]] - ''802.11ac WiFi + BT + NFC SiP Module'' :[[Marvell]] 88W8897 - SDIO/USB/UART/PCIe (LGA Module) *[[AzureWave AW-GH381]] - ''802.11bg WiFi + BT Combo SiP Module'' :[[Marvell]] 88W8688 - SDIO/SPI for WiFi; UART Bluetooth; [http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan264.html EW]
